assignments.description: Assigns status Accept and Pinned = true to the actual SA record
assignments.name: AssignAcceptStatusAndPinned
assignments.label: AssignAcceptStatusAndPinned

assignments.description: Set the Actual Response Time Field on the Related Work Order
assignments.name: AssignActualResponseTime
assignments.label: Assign Actual Response Time

assignments.description: Calls a subflow that handles all Timesheet Entry generation
assignments.name: AssignNonBreakFixStatusOnsite
assignments.label: AssignNonBreakFixStatusOnsite

assignments.description: Assign the outcome from the Travel-Onsite Selection
assignments.name: AssignNonBreakFixStatusTravel
assignments.label: AssignNonBreakFixStatusTravel

assignments.description: Since Onsite is the only status to be selected and by default selected, we can directly assign the result here once the flow reaches this point. Also the actual start time will be set to NOW.
assignments.name: AssignStatusOnsite
assignments.label: AssignStatusOnsite

assignments.description: Since Travel is the only status to be selected and by default selected, we can directly assign the result here once the flow reaches this point.
assignments.name: AssignStatusTravel
assignments.label: AssignStatusTravel

decisions.description: This is verifying whether it was possible to find an existing record for the excluded resource on the required SA parent object or not.
decisions.name: AssignedResourceAlreadyExistsAsExcludedResource
decisions.label: AssignedResourceAlreadyExistsAsExcludedResource

decisions.name: Is_current_User_the_Assigned_Resource
decisions.label: Is current User the Assigned Resource?

decisions.description: Check to see if the related work order actual response time is null
decisions.name: IsActualResponseTimeNull
decisions.label: Is Actual Response Time Null

decisions.description: Verifies if Travel has been selected.
decisions.name: IsSelectionTravel
decisions.label: IsSelectionTravel

recordCreates.description: Note: Maybe we need to check first if such a record exists, because otherwise we might run into an error when we try to add the same resource again to the excluded resources. The creation step would fail. In theory it could be possible for a Dispatcher to schedule the task as an exception again to a excluded resource.
recordCreates.name: ExcludeEngineerFromParentWO
recordCreates.label: ExcludeEngineerFromParentWO

recordLookups.description: This step verifies whether there is already a Resource Preference object for this engineer and parent WO object or not. Any found ID will be stored in a variable. Only if the variable is NULL a new resource preference record will be created as otherwise the flow step will fail and raise an error.
recordLookups.name: VerifyIfAssignedEngineerIsAlreadyAddedAsExcludedToWO
recordLookups.label: VerifyIfAssignedEngineerIsAlreadyAddedAsExcludedToWO

recordUpdates.description: Set SA Status to the user selected value of the screen component. This should be in this case Reject.
recordUpdates.name: SetSAStatusReject
recordUpdates.label: SetSAStatusReject

recordUpdates.description: This will update the SA record with all changes assigned to it.
recordUpdates.name: UpdateSA
recordUpdates.label: UpdateSA

fields.name: DisplayCannotDisplaySAStatus
fields.fieldText: You cannot change the Service Appointment status.

fields.name: HSE_Error
fields.fieldText: A Safety Check must be done before you can 'check out' and finish flow.

fields.name: Status
fields.fieldText: Flow not available for Service Appointment in status {!currSA.Status}.

screens.description: If Status = Travel, show status Onsite
screens.name: ShowStatusOnsite
screens.label: ShowStatusOnsite

screens.description: If status is Accept, show as next option Travel.
screens.name: ShowStatusTravel
screens.label: ShowStatusTravel

variables.description: Stores the current Service Appointment fields
variables.name: currSA

variables.description: This variable stores the Resource Preference record ID in case there exists already a record for the assigned resource and the given SA parent object ID as excluded resource.
variables.name: ExistentExcludedResourcePreferenceForAssignedResource
